verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I just want to love
I just want to sing
To the One above
Who has touched this thirsty soul
(2nd time)
And now I'll never be the same

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'll always love You
I'll always sing to You, Jesus
I long to worship You in Spirit and in truth

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Everyday I'll come
Spend my life with You
Learning of Your heart
And what You're calling me to do
(2nd time)
My every breathe belongs to You

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And with this song
We'll lift the name of Jesus higher
And with a shout
We'll raise up one voice
